text:
hey guys, I’m Anton. A Designer and Frontend-Webdev from Germany. I’ve worked for a HubSpot Agency for about a year. Now I’m active in the HubSpot Community board(most likely in the HubSpot Developer section). Also I like to do stuff(web, design, 3d modelling, a bit of video editing …)

Thanks for the invite to the slack :slightly_smiling_face:
